entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of snow or drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
